title: larry_vw_1955
author: larry_vw_1955
content: https://www.cnbc.com/2023/09/27/costco-is-selling-gold-bars-and-they-are-selling-out-within-a-few-hours.htmlYes, the retail warehousing giant is your one-stop shop for 1 ounce gold PAMP Suisse Lady Fortuna Veriscan bars, handsomely detailed and ready for purchase.They’re available for the bargain price of … well, you have to be a member to know that, but apparently they were selling for a little shy of $1,900 recently, according to chatter on Reddit. Spot gold most recently was going for $1,876.56 an ounce as of Wednesday afternoon.Imagine if bitcoin had this type of demand, it could literally go up to $100,000 or more.   Overnight! But I guess there's a reason why people like gold. It's real and you can touch it and see it.
